LaunchParams.summary: NOTE Experimental The LaunchParams interface of the {{domxref("Launch Handler API", "Launch Handler API", "", "nocode")}} is used when implementing custom launch navigation handling in a PWA. When is invoked to set up the launch navigation handling functionality, the callback function inside setConsumer() is passed a LaunchParams object instance.

remarks.para: Such custom navigation handling is initiated via when a PWA has been launched with a launch_handler client_mode value of focus-existing, navigate-new, or navigate-existing.

-Launch Handler API: Control how your app is launched
-
-Musicr 2.0 demo app
